localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
blogPost.body: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
blogPost.title: KooKit - Keep your phone cool & wirelessly charge at the same time
blogPost.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持无线充电的同时，还能为手机降温。它能在电池寿命和手机性能之间进行调整，使手机长时间运行在最佳状态。
localize.tagline: 保持手机凉爽，同时进行无线充电

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持無線充電的同時，還能爲手機降溫。它能在電池壽命和手機性能之間進行調整，使手機長時間運行在最佳狀態。
localize.tagline: 保持手機涼爽，同時進行無線充電

previous.title:
If you lend the government money today, they’ll give you 2.5% per year and return all of your money in 2051.

Almost sounds too good to be true.

localize.full_text:
如果你今天把钱借给政府 他们每年会给你2. 5%的利息 然后在2051年归还你所有的钱

听起来好得不像真的

如果你今天把錢借給政府 他們每年會給你2. 5%的利息 然後在2051年歸還你所有的錢

聽起來好得不像真的

next.excerpt: With Portal, let your clients login on your own website and give them one place for payments, messaging, file-sharing, eSignatures, intake forms, and more.
next.title: Portal - The modern client portal

localize.description: 通过Portal，让您的客户在自己的网站上登录，并为他们提供一个地方进行支付、信息传递、文件共享、电子签名、接收表格等。
通過Portal，讓您的客戶在自己的網站上登錄，併爲他們提供一個地方進行支付、信息傳遞、文件共享、電子簽名、接收表格等。
